Messages.Author: Johannes Niediek
Messages.Content: Dear students, We organized this course for the first time as a module this semester. We also introduced the flash presentations, the group presentations, and the discussion rounds just this semester. Therefore, we have never received feedback on these ideas, and on the course in general. Thus: please take a few minutes to participate in the anonymous course evaluation! This is really by far the best way for us to improve!  Survey link: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=3HZTL  Thank you! Saeed and Johannes

Messages.Author: Johannes Niediek
Messages.Content: Dear participants, I thought that it would be nice to put the slides from all presentations online in the ISIS course, just in case someone wants to look up something later on, or to get inspiration for another presentation, etc. It is very little work to put the slides online, and everyone made some effort to prepare them. If we don't have your slides because you presented from a browser, could you please convert them to PDF and send them? If you don't agree that we put your slides online, that's completely fine as well. Please notify us in this case. Best regards, Johannes

Messages.Author: Johannes Niediek
Messages.Content: Dear students, Please take a few minutes to participate in the anonymous course evaluation for this semester. Your feedback is essential for us to improve and refine the course.  Survey link: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=3HZTL  We appreciate your input, and we promise that all comments will be considered. This is how you can influence how we teach this course in the future.  Thank you! Saeed and Johannes

Messages.Author: Johannes Niediek
Messages.Content: Dear participants, The module exam for our seminar is now open in the MTS. Please register for the exam before June 14th, as this is necessary for receiving a grade and for passing the module. See you tomorrow! Best, Johannes

Messages.Author: Saeed Salehinajafabadi
Messages.Content: Dear all, Thank you again for your really good presentations on Friday and we were so happy to see you this excited. Regarding your main presentations, please also consider using Google Slides to create your slides and presentations, since it is easier for collaboration between you and your group-mate and us. This is also a reminder that you are recommended to ask me and Johannes if you have any questions on the paper, and for comments on the presentation. with kind regards, Johannes and Saeed

Messages.Author: Johannes Niediek
Messages.Content: Dear all, We were very happy with today's presentations! We gave you points on a 1-10 point scale (10 is the best), and each presentation got either 8, 9, or 10 points. We will hand out the individual points together with the final grade in the end. We are looking forward to the full presentations, and hope that today's feedback was useful for your preparation! Enjoy the weekend, and keep up the high motivation! Best, Saeed and Johannes

Messages.Author: Saeed Salehinajafabadi
Messages.Content: Dear all, we would like to kindly remind you to send us your flash presentation  preferably as PDF file by tomorrow morning (17.May) 09:00 AM. Thank you in advance and see you tomorrow at 13:15 :)

Messages.Author: Saeed Salehinajafabadi
Messages.Content: I apologize for not providing the email address: salehinajafabadi@campus.tu-berlin.de johannes.niediek@tu-berlin.de
